SVM_C.description: 'C' parameter (weighting for loss function) for the SVM algorithm.

SVM_D.description: 'd' parameter (margin offset) for the SVM algorithm.

SVM_M.description: 'm' parameter (margin weighting) for the SVM algorithm.

SVM_MaxJump.description: Maximum size of any change in level the algorithm may make.

SVM_StagDist.description: Stagnation distance criterion. Changes within this distance lead to the satisfaction of the stagnation end condition.

SVM_N_StagSteps.description: Number of presentations to consider to evaluate stagnation.

SVM_MinStep.description: Minimum number of presentations before the exam can end.
